DataElement.preferredName: Past Integer::4 Week Adult Pain Treat Problem Social Networking Interference Psychometrics Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the response to a QLAC question posed to an adult about how pain or its treatment interfered with social activities over the past four weeks. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Past Integer::4 Week Adult Pain Treat Problem Social Networking Interference
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::4_Any period of seven consecutive days._A human who has reached reproductive age._A form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse._A conscious or unconscious refusal to encounter situations, activities, or objects; the act or practice of keeping away from or withdrawing from something._A human who has reached reproductive age._The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings._Subject to a process with the aim of readying for some purpose, improving, or remedying a condition._Problem; a state of difficulty that needs to be resolved.__Establishing relationships with individuals who have similar social or professional interests for the purposes of expanding knowledge and professional/social interaction. (Glanz et al: Heath Behavior & Health Education, 1990)_Apprehension of danger and dread accompanied by restlessness, tension, tachycardia, and dyspnea unattached to a clearly identifiable stimulus.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part.::4:Any period of seven consecutive days.:A human who has reached reproductive age.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
An age group comprised of humans who have reached reproductive age.

Property.preferredDefinition: An unpleasant sensation induced by noxious stimuli and generally received by specialized nerve endings.:Subject to a process with the aim of readying for some purpose, improving, or remedying a condition.:Establishing relationships with individuals who have similar social or professional interests for the purposes of expanding knowledge and professional/social interaction. (Glanz et al: Heath Behavior & Health Education, 1990):Apprehension of danger and dread accompanied by restlessness, tension, tachycardia, and dyspnea unattached to a clearly identifiable stimulus.

Concepts.definition: The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.
Subject to a process with the aim of readying for some purpose, improving, or remedying a condition.

Establishing relationships with individuals who have similar social or professional interests for the purposes of expanding knowledge and professional/social interaction. (Glanz et al: Heath Behavior & Health Education, 1990)
Apprehension of danger and dread accompanied by restlessness, tension, tachycardia, and dyspnea unattached to a clearly identifiable stimulus.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated to support the Quality of Life in Adult Cancer Survivors Scale (QLAC), a validated psychometric measure developed by Dr. Nancy E. Avis

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The science of measuring "psychological" aspects of a person such as knowledge, skills, abilities, or personality.
